column1: Kata Robata////I am a biiig ramen fan. I was told that the ramen at Kata Robata is excellent. So for numerous Thursdays over the last 6 months
column2: I have been hitting this place up for the ramens especially
column4: the wifey and I decided to change it up a bit and tried the sashimi salad
column5: other sashimi entrees and a few rolls. The dinner was mind blowing. The quality of the ingredients is excellent and the coupled with good preparation and immaculate presentation
column6: its a very enjoyable experience. The service was good too; the wait staff kept the sake flowing. I highly recommend this joint.
